description:
<p>The Anaesthetics Directorate is looking for an enthusiastic and motivated Support Secretary to provide support to our Chronic Pain Management service, based at the Worcester Royal Hospital and Kidderminster Treatment Centre.  The successful applicant will have previous medical secretarial experience. They will also need to have excellent verbal and written communication skills, be able to prioritise their workload, work under pressure and work flexibly to support our Chronic Pain Management Department.  The hours of work are 31 hours per week over five days, Monday – Friday.</p>
<p><strong>Informal enquires please contact, Gemma Clement, Directorate Support Manager on 01905 763333 extension 30389 (Tuesday, Thursday and Friday) or via email Gemma.Clement@nhs.net.</strong></p>
